content: Im new to issabelle but Im fimilliar with lean. (with mathlib). Where do I start as a beginner? Thanks!

As a beginner from HOL4 I recently started with Isabelle. Quite a few people suggest https://isabelle.in.tum.de/website-Isabelle2024-RC1/dist/library/Doc/Prog_Prove/prog-prove.pdf
It seems a canonical place to start.
I tried it, and found it is readable. Especially for the Isar stuff. I found it helpful to go through the exercises.
